quickly bit the dust as Moon doesn't seem to understand weekly, nor consist=
encey, as the first voices requested. He also never said anything about bei=
ng on C2C again, and "Frank's Box" will be  specifically discussed, as ment=
ioned in the show promo on the C2C site. I think niether Moon, nor the C2C =
staff want facts to interfere with the discussions! I think he can stick hi=
s "Scole" meetings, and any other scams up his -----, and may he get the sp=
irit contacts he deserves!   "

and editor of Haunted Times Magazine, Christopher Moon will discuss hauntin=
gs as well as his work with Frank's Box, a device which summons the dead"  =
 Great, once again making public claims about a system he's never paid a di=
me for, makes untold amounts of money with, has no knowledge of how it work=
s, and what it's really for....on and on! better hit send before I really g=
et pissed!  Frank-S

Ann
